response.overview: If you're an anime fan, you might have just struck gold! This is a pretty sweet anime film featuring a bad ass samurai story along with some amazing anime sex scenes in there too! Warriors go to the extreme to protect their honor and the sexual virtue of their prized beauties. They go to lengths to fight off evil doers who want to strip them of their prized possession - their anal cavity. These warriors are the only ones to trespass that sacred garden and the samurai will protect it at all costs!This movie is presented in English and features lots of Bishonen type characters.
response.title: Anal Fantasy
